string.rus:

%c[255,1,255,255]ТРЕК 07:%c[255,1,255,1] Pillar: For the love of the game 
%c[255,1,255,255]ТРЕК 08:%c[255,1,255,1] Skillet: The last night 
%c[255,1,255,255]ТРЕК 09:%c[255,1,255,1] Breaking Benjamin: Breath
